scripts.start: pnpx supabase status || pnpx supabase start
scripts.reset: pnpx supabase db reset || pnpx supabase start
scripts.db:generate: npm config set script-shell "/bin/bash"; source ../.env && pnpx supabase gen types typescript --project-id $SUPABASE_PROJECT_REF > ./functions/_shared/database.d.ts && cp -f ./functions/_shared/database.d.ts ../packages/db/types/src/database.ts
scripts.fn:deploy: npm config set script-shell "/bin/bash"; source ../.env && pnpx supabase@1.115.0 functions deploy --project-ref $SUPABASE_PROJECT_REF
scripts.db:migrate: npm config set script-shell "/bin/bash"; source ../.env && pnpx supabase db reset --db-url $SUPABASE_DB_URL
scripts.db:dump: pnpm db:dump:schema && pnpm db:dump:data && pnpm db:dump:role
scripts.db:dump:schema: npm config set script-shell "/bin/bash"; source ../.env && pnpx supabase@1.112.0 db dump -f supabase/db/schema.sql --db-url $SUPABASE_DB_URL
scripts.db:dump:data: npm config set script-shell "/bin/bash"; source ../.env && pnpx supabase@1.112.0 db dump -f supabase/db/data.sql --db-url $SUPABASE_DB_URL --data-only
scripts.db:dump:role: npm config set script-shell "/bin/bash"; source ../.env && pnpx supabase@1.112.0 db dump -f supabase/db/role.sql --db-url $SUPABASE_DB_URL --role-only
scripts.deploy: pnpx supabase link --project-ref $SUPABASE_PROJECT_REF && npx supabase db push
